link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
Antti Karttunen, Data supplement: n, a(n) computed for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences related to binary expansion of n
Index entries for sequences operating on polynomials in ring GF(2)[X]
program: (Scheme) (define (A280501 n) (A091255bi n (A193231 n))) ;; A091255bi implements the 2-argument GF(2)[X] GCD-function (A091255).
A193231(n) = { my(x='x); subst(lift(Mod(1, 2)*subst(Pol(binary(n), x), x, 1+x)), x, 2) }; \\ From A193231
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 09 2017
